name: 自动开关clash
description: 打开需要软件时开启clash，杀软件后关闭By OCT310
condition: if (frontPkgChanged == true && globalVarOf$clash.contains(to)) {ui.showShortToast("Clash开启🏄");su.exe("am start-service -n com.github.kr328.clash/.service.TunService");} else if (pkgKilled == true && globalVarOf$clash.contains(pkgName)) { ui.showShortToast("Clash关闭🙅");su.exe("am force-stop com.github.kr328.clash")}
